        public Guest(java.lang.String theName,
             java.lang.String theSurname,
             int theAge,
             java.lang.String theId,
             java.lang.String thePhone,
             java.util.Calendar theCheckIn,
             java.util.Calendar theCheckOut)
        The constructor is the founder of all information about guest. The constructor have all personel information.All information will come from PersonInfo abstract class and add check-In, check-Out date
        Parameters:
        theName - the name info about guest to doing reservation
        theSurname - the surname info about guest to doing reservation
        theAge - age of guest to doing reservation
        theId - identification number of guest
        thePhone - personel telephone number of guest
        theCheckIn - check-in date of guest for reservation
        theCheckOut - check-out date of guest for reservation
